name: Garfiend
description:
Garfiend demands more food!  Grab your sword and put him on a diet!

For the full game, wishlist DIRE VENGEANCE on Steam

KEYBOARD CONTROLS

MOVE LEFT: A

MOVE RIGHT: D

CROUCH: S

JUMP*: SPACE

SWORD: B

HAMMER: N

XBOX CONTROLS

MOVE LEFT: 🡸

MOVE RIGHT: 🡺

CROUCH: 🡻

JUMP*: A 

SWORD: X

HAMMER: Y

*NOTE: The player can triple jump
